items.description: Decadent triple chocolate brownie served with optional featured toppings

8oz salmon with Cajun crust and classic shrimp tacos. (Price corrected from $35.99 to $25.99)
Beer-battered cod with spicy coleslaw, sweet chili mayo, and grilled pineapple.
Pan-seared cod with scrunchions and mustard pickle batter sauce.

Beef burger with bacon, cheddar, paniko onion rings, lettuce, red onion, pickles, and house sauce. Served with choice of fries, roasted/mashed potatoes, or salad. Substitute sweet potato fries/onion rings (+$5.95).
Classic beef burger with tomato, lettuce, red onion, pickle, and house sauce. Substitutions available (+$5.95).
Newfoundland moose patty with brie, bacon, rhubarb pickles, and crispy onions.
Beef patty with Guinness BBQ sauce, Dublin old cheddar, bacon, crispy onions, lettuce, and tomato.
Pan-seared chicken breast with sweet cranberry mayo, lettuce, and tomato.
Chickpea patty with tzatziki, feta, garlic, onion, parsley, and cilantro.
Triple-decker sandwich with roasted chicken breast, bacon, lettuce, tomato, black forest ham, cheddar, and mayo. Can be made as a wrap.
Flatbread with chopped steak, sautéed onions, mushrooms, béchamel, mozzarella, and crispy onions.
Chicken breast with prosciutto, Swiss cheese, pickled onion, basil pesto mayo, lettuce, and tomato. Can be made as a wrap.
Murphy's and molasses braised beef brisket with Swiss cheese and au jus. Can be made as a wrap.
Sautéed steak with mushrooms, onions, mozzarella, and au jus dip. Can be made as a wrap.
Roasted turkey with savoury dressing and gravy on fresh bread. Can be made as a wrap.
Award-winning cakes with cod, crab, potatoes, onions, pickles, and tartar sauce.
Creamy dip with crab meat, ice shrimp, chopped artichokes, and crispy pita chips.
Pan-fried with scrunchions, rhubarb pickles, and mustard pickle tartar sauce.
Seared scallops with crispy bacon and maple Cajun sauce, served with peppers.
Classic nachos with layered tortilla chips, jalapeño, black beans, olives, and cheddar-monterey jack-mozzarella blend. Add-ons: Chicken (+$5), extra cheese (+$4).
Loaded nachos with roasted tomato, jalapeño, black beans, red onion, ½ lb cheese blend, and BBQ sauce. Add-ons: Guacamole (+$4), salsa/sour cream (+$2).
Nachos topped with Murphy's and molasses braised beef brisket, jalapeño, black beans, olives, and cheese blend.
Crisp romaine with house-made Caesar dressing, bacon, parmesan, and croutons. Add-ons: Oven-roasted chicken (+$5), scallops (+$11), shrimp (+$9), striploin (+$19).
Mixed greens with cherry tomatoes, carrot, sweet/spicy pecans, goat cheese, and herb yogurt dressing. (Fixed typo: 'Beet Beet' → 'Beet')
Slow-braised lamb in red wine and lamb sauce with cream, parmesan, roasted mushrooms, broccoli, and peppers.
Fettuccine with garlic Alfredo sauce and parmesan. Add roasted chicken or grilled shrimp (+$9).
Newfoundland mussels steamed in white wine garlic cream.
Lightly coated in seasoned flour, fried, and tossed in Cajun seasoning.
Spinach and cream cheese with crispy bacon, 3-cheese blend, served with tortilla chips and baguette.

Roasted turkey with salt beef, root vegetables, and noodles.
Shrimp, scallops, and mussels in garlic pesto cream sauce with parmesan.
Fettuccine in spicy tomato sauce with cherry tomatoes and bell peppers. Add chicken or shrimp (+$9).
